title: Total War Game Music Loops
description: 41 music loops included - Total War Game Music Loops is a music loop library created to fulfill your action and adventure appetite.
longDescription:
Audio Demos

YouTube Demo

41 music loops included - Total War Game Music Loops is a music loop library created to fulfill your action and adventure appetite. Crafted specifically for games and film, Total War Game Music Loops brings you multiple military genres of bombastic war music. Inside you will find over 40+ music loops from epic orchestral, cartoon adventure to hybrid warfare. Inspired by hit app and console games like Call of Duty, Total War Game Music Loop Library allows you to easily construct your very own custom soundtrack to score your next production. Not to mention all soundtrack loops were composed and produced by ESM's very own award winning game and film composer “David Levy”. Cue in the war drums and battle cadences.
technicalDetails:
Features:

  • 41 music loops
  • 58 minutes of music
  • 620.5 MB of samples
  • All in 44.1k 16bit .wav file format
  • Military Game Music Loop Library
  • 13 Cartoon Adventure Loops
  • 6 Electronic Upbeat Loops
  • 14 Epic Orchestral War Loops
  • 8 Hybrid Battle Loops

Number of Audio Wavs: 41

Number of Audio Cues: 41

Sample rate / bit rate: 44.1 kHz, 16bit Stereo WAVs

Does music loop: Yes

Minutes of audio provided: 58 minutes

Supported Development Platforms:Windows, Mac, PS4, iOS, Android, Xbox One, Oculus, SteamVR / HTC Vive, Gear VR, Linux, HTML5

Supported Target Build Platforms:Windows, Mac, PS4, iOS, Android, Xbox One, Oculus, SteamVR / HTC Vive, Gear VR, Linux, HTML5

Documentation: Content List
